General.Name: Reworld Media
General.Description: Reworld Media Société Anonyme engages in thematic media business in France. It offers a range of contents, products, and services to audience, as well as multi-media and multi-format brands. The company also provides brand marketing, including OTC or event-based advertising; and performance marketing comprising affiliation or programmatic advertising solutions. The company was incorporated in 2001 and is based in Boulogne-Billancourt, France.

3.Name: Mr. Frederic  Bardet
3.Title: Exec. Director of HR, Facilities & Legal
